description.ko: 빛의 굴절이 지닌 수학적 우아함을 탐구하며, 백색광이 기하학적 유리를 통과해 본연의 색상들로 분리되는 찰나의 순간을 담아냅니다.
description.en: An exploration of the mathematical elegance of light refraction, capturing the moment white light breaks into its constituent colors through geometric glass.

prompt: A macro cinematic shot of a crystalline prism intercepting a sharp beam of white light, refracting into a vibrant and detailed rainbow spectrum across a minimalist grey surface. High-quality glass texture, caustic light patterns, ray tracing, 8k resolution, soft bokeh background, ethereal atmosphere.
